Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a leadoff home run in the first inning
Every player in the Dodgers lineup got a hit
The Dodgers added multiple runs to their lead in the third, fourth, sixth, and eighth innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers have a 3-1 lead in the NLCS
The Mets have few good starting pitching options after Kodai Senga's rough Game 1
David Peterson will get the start for the Mets in Game 5
Others: The Dodgers' offense was relentless and exacting
The Mets have been struggling with their pitching
The Dodgers bullpen took over from Yoshinobu Yamamoto and didn't allow a run
The Mets have a tough task ahead in Game 5
